mapper.select: SELECT result.THEATER_ID, result.THEATER_NAME, result.START_TIME, result.TOTAL_SEAT, result.TIME_ID, COUNT(r.RESERVE_ID) AS RESERVED_SEAT FROM RESERVATION r RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT cttm.THEATER_ID, THEATER_NAME, START_TIME, COUNT(s.SEAT_ID) AS TOTAL_SEAT, cttm.TIME_ID FROM ( SELECT THEATER_NAME, START_TIME, ctt.THEATER_ID, ctt.TIME_ID FROM ( SELECT THEATER_NAME, t.THEATER_ID, MOVIE_ID, START_TIME, TIME_ID FROM ( SELECT THEATER_NAME, THEATER_ID FROM THEATER T WHERE T.CINEMA_ID = #{cinemaId} ) ct, TIMETABLE t WHERE ct.THEATER_ID = t.THEATER_ID ) ctt, MOVIE m WHERE #{movieId}=ctt.MOVIE_ID AND #{movieId}= m.MOVIE_ID )cttm, SEAT s WHERE cttm.THEATER_ID = s.THEATER_ID GROUP BY cttm.THEATER_ID, THEATER_NAME, START_TIME, cttm.TIME_ID ) result ON r.TIME_ID = result.TIME_ID GROUP BY result.THEATER_ID, result.THEATER_NAME, result.START_TIME, result.TOTAL_SEAT, result.TIME_ID ;
